problem_text_cn: 如图,已知在△ABC中,DE∥BC,BC=6,ED=2,点A到BC的距离为5,则A到DE的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, BC = N_0, ED = N_1, the distance from point A to BC is N_2, then the distance from A to DE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图作AH⊥BC于H,交DE于F．则AH=5．∵DE∥BC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AF}{AH},∴\frac{2}{6}=\frac{AF}{5},∴AF=\frac{5}{3}∴A到DE的距离是\frac{5}{3}．故选:B．
